  • 4.26. umbra.globals.constants

4.26. umbra.globals.constants¶

constants.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines Umbra package default constants through the Constants class.

Others:

4.26.1. Classes¶

class umbra.globals.constants.Constants[source]¶

Defines Umbra package default constants.

applicationName = u'Umbra'¶
Parameters:applicationName (unicode) – Package Application name.
majorVersion = u'1'¶
Parameters:majorVersion (unicode) – Package major version.
minorVersion = u'0'¶
Parameters:minorVersion (unicode) – Package minor version.
changeVersion = u'9'¶
Parameters:changeVersion (unicode) – Package change version.
version = u'1.0.9'¶
Parameters:version (unicode) – Package version.
logger = u'Umbra_Logger'¶
Parameters:logger (unicode) – Package logger name.
verbosityLevel = 3¶
Parameters:verbosityLevel (int) – Default logging verbosity level.
verbosityLabels = (u'Critical', u'Error', u'Warning', u'Info', u'Debug')¶
Parameters:verbosityLabels (tuple) – Logging verbosity labels.
loggingDefaultFormatter = u'Default'¶
Parameters:loggingDefaultFormatter (unicode) – Default logging formatter name.
loggingSeparators = u'************************************************************************************************'¶
Parameters:loggingSeparators (unicode) – Logging separators.
defaultCodec = 'utf-8'¶
Parameters:defaultCodec (unicode) – Default codec.
codecError = 'ignore'¶
Parameters:codecError (unicode) – Default codec error behavior.

Parameters:applicationDirectory (unicode) – Package Application directory.
providerDirectory = u'HDRLabs'¶
Parameters:providerDirectory (unicode) – Package provider directory.

Parameters:patchesDirectory (unicode) – Application patches directory.

Parameters:settingsDirectory (unicode) – Application settings directory.

Parameters:userComponentsDirectory (unicode) – Application user components directory.
loggingDirectory = u'logging'¶
Parameters:loggingDirectory (unicode) – Application logging directory.
ioDirectory = u'io'¶
Parameters:ioDirectory (unicode) – Application io directory.

Parameters:preferencesDirectories (tuple) – Application preferences directories.

Parameters:factoryComponentsDirectory (unicode) – Application factory components directory.

Parameters:factoryAddonsComponentsDirectory (unicode) – Application addons components directory.
resourcesDirectory = u'resources'¶
Parameters:resourcesDirectory (unicode) – Application resources directory.

Parameters:patchesFile (unicode) – Application settings file.
settingsFile = u'Umbra_Settings.rc'¶
Parameters:settingsFile (unicode) – Application settings file.

Parameters:loggingFile (unicode) – Application logging file.
librariesDirectory = u'libraries'¶
Parameters:librariesDirectory (unicode) – Application libraries directory.

Parameters:defaultTimerCycle (int) – Default timer cycle length in milliseconds.

Parameters:nullObject (unicode) – Default null object string.
